title: Career advice
content: I am in first year cse .(Ec campus) I want to become an app developer.so is it good for me to just focus on coding and things required for app developer.like the python pes taught me in sem 1 is no where near up to date . And I don't want to expect anything from pes in c language too .so can I just start slowly and focus on one field .like i have interest and already seen other fields

comments.body: I dabbled a little in app dev , if your interested in that I recommend learning kotlin first with jetpack compose .
Never worked on react native so can't comment, but most multiplatform apps built today are all based on kotlin multiplatform.
